# About {#sec-about}

<div style="text-align: justify; font-weight:600">

The UKRI CDT in AI for Medical Diagnosis and Care is training over 50 graduates to become leaders in the application 
of artificial intelligence to healthcare. With a focus on research excellence, collaboration, and innovation, the Centre is committed to 
producing highly skilled professionals who can harness AI to develop secure, privacy-compliant solutions for medical diagnosis and care. 
<!--- The Centre prioritises equality, diversity, and inclusion, aiming for a balanced cohort of graduates from diverse health and STEM backgrounds. -->
By fostering industry partnerships and international collaborations, the Centre aims to position the UK as a global leader in health-related 
AI research and technology transfer.

Our annual conference brings together the CDTâ€™s students, academics, and industry partners, offering a dynamic platform to explore and 
discuss the latest research from the CDT. Students will share updates on their progress, while our speakers will offer new perspectives to 
enrich the community. We hope that the event will provide an opportunity for our diverse network of AI researchers, healthcare professionals, 
and partners to reconnect and seek further opportunities for collaboration.

</div>

# Venue {#sec-venue}

```{r warning=FALSE, message=FALSE, echo=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(warning = FALSE, message = FALSE)
library(dplyr,warn.conflicts = FALSE)
library(leaflet,warn.conflicts = FALSE)
library(leaflet.extras)
library(htmltools,warn.conflicts = FALSE)

content <- paste(sep = "<br/>",
  "<b><a href='https://www.google.co.uk/maps/dir//Nexus+-+University+of+Leeds,+Discovery+Way,+Leeds+LS2+3AA/@53.8052821,-1.5502785,15z/data=!4m9!4m8!1m0!1m5!1m1!1s0x48795c028b513609:0x6014fd660699c8ee!2m2!1d-1.5502785!2d53.8052821!3e0' target='_blank'>Nexus</a></b>",
  "Discovery Way",
  "University of Leeds",
  "Leeds, LS2 3AA"
)

leaflet() %>% setView(-1.550028, 53.805251, zoom = 15) %>% addTiles() %>% addResetMapButton() %>%
  addPopups(lng=-1.550028, lat=53.805251, content,
    options = popupOptions(closeButton = FALSE, autoClose = FALSE, closeOnClick = FALSE)
  )
```
